title.value: Testing Feedforward Neural Networks Training Programs
title.justification: This is the title listed on the first page of the paper.
title.quote: Testing Feedforward Neural Networks Training Programs

extractions.description: The paper discusses the improvement of performance and trustworthiness of Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) for safety-critical systems by proposing practical verification routines for detecting issues during the training of DNNs. It introduces TheDeepChecker, a TensorFlow-based debugging library, and compares it empirically with Amazon SageMaker Debugger.

type.justification: The paper conducts an empirical evaluation and case study to assess the effectiveness of TheDeepChecker.
type.quote: As an empirical evaluation, we conduct a case study to assess the effectiveness of TheDeepChecker on synthetic and real-world buggy DL programs and compare its performance to that of the Amazon SageMaker Debugger (SMD).

name.justification: The paper primarily focuses on improving and debugging Deep Neural Networks, which are a key component of Machine Learning.
name.quote: Nowadays, we are witnessing an increase in efforts to improve the reliability of Deep Neural Networks (DNNs), and consequently the trustworthiness of deep learning based systems such as self-driving cars or aircraft collision-avoidance systems.

name.justification: The paper is concerned with the development, testing, and debugging of software programs used for training deep learning models.
name.quote: Multiple testing techniques are proposed to generate test cases that can expose inconsistencies in the behavior of DNN models.

name.justification: The primary model discussed and used for the evaluation in the paper is the Deep Feed-Forward Neural Network.
name.quote: We present in the following the Deep Feed-Forward Neural Network and its popular variant Convolutional Neural Network.

is_contributed.justification: The model itself is not a new contribution of the paper; it is used within the scope of the evaluation.
is_contributed.quote: We present in the following the Deep Feed-Forward Neural Network and its popular variant Convolutional Neural Network.

is_executed.justification: The model was executed as part of the evaluation in empirical studies.
is_executed.quote: As an empirical evaluation, we conduct a case study to assess the effectiveness of TheDeepChecker on synthetic and real-world buggy DL programs.

is_compared.justification: The performance of the model trained using TheDeepChecker was compared to other models and debugged using Amazon SageMaker Debugger.
is_compared.quote: Besides, we assess the performance of TheDeepChecker on a mixed selection of 20 real-world TF buggy programs splitted equally between snippets of code shared on StackOverflow (SO) and bug-fixing commits from DL projects hosted on GitHub (GH).

referenced_paper_title.justification: The model is a well-known neural network architecture and does not have a single reference paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We present in the following the Deep Feed-Forward Neural Network and its popular variant Convolutional Neural Network.

name.justification: The paper discusses using the MNIST dataset for evaluating the benchmarks.
name.quote: The ShallowCNN achieved 99.35% accuracy rate on the test set.

aliases: Modified National Institute of Standards and Technology database

referenced_paper_title.value: The MNIST database of handwritten digits
referenced_paper_title.justification: The MNIST dataset is widely known and referenced within the machine learning community.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The ShallowCNN achieved 99.35% accuracy rate on the test set.

name.justification: The CIFAR-10 dataset was used as part of the empirical evaluation of TheDeepChecker.
name.quote: The DeepCNN achieved 89.15% accuracy rate on the test set.

referenced_paper_title.justification: CIFAR-10 is a well-known dataset in the machine learning field and is used for image classification tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The DeepCNN achieved 89.15% accuracy rate on the test set.

name.justification: The paper utilizes the Auto MPG dataset to train and evaluate regression tasks.
name.quote: The RegrNN reached less than 1.85 of mean absolute error on unscaled outputs within the range of [10, 47].

referenced_paper_title.justification: The Auto MPG dataset is a popular dataset used in the machine learning field for regression tasks.
referenced_paper_title.quote: The RegrNN reached less than 1.85 of mean absolute error on unscaled outputs within the range of [10, 47].

name.justification: The paper details the use of TensorFlow as the primary deep learning library for implementing TheDeepChecker.
name.quote: To assess the effectiveness of TheDeepChecker, we implemented it as a TensorFlow-based testing framework that enables the automatic detection of the identified issues in DNN training programs developed with TensorFlow (TF) library.

referenced_paper_title.value: TensorFlow: Large-scale machine learning on heterogeneous systems
referenced_paper_title.justification: TensorFlow is a widely referenced and utilized deep learning library.
referenced_paper_title.quote: To assess the effectiveness of TheDeepChecker, we implemented it as a TensorFlow-based testing framework that enables the automatic detection of the identified issues in DNN training programs developed with TensorFlow (TF) library.
